sentences.sContent: We put a tape player, then a computer, on their desks.
sentences.sCn: 我们只在他们的书桌上放上一个收音机和一台电脑。

sentences.sContent: Villagers hopped on and off the back of the truck as we drove along, grabbing lifts, and the hum of the Taliban chants from a tape player broke through the sound of the rain and the waterfalls.
sentences.sCn: 一路上有人搭便车，村民们从卡车后面跳上跳下，塔利班反复哼唱的嗡嗡声从磁带录音机里发出，打断了雨水和瀑布的声音。

trans.tranCn: 激光唱机; 光盘播放机
trans.tranOther: a machine on which you can play CDs
